original_text: Jacob said to them, ‘You have brought great trouble to me! You should not have told the man that you had another brother.’
korean_text: 이스라엘이 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 너희에게 또 다른 아우가 있다고 그 사람에게 말하여 나를 괴롭게 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: 'You have brought great trouble to me!
You should not have told the man
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 사람에게 말해서는 안 되었는데
